text: Herviella evelinae is a species of sea slug, an aeolid nudibranch, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Facelinidae.MolluscaBase (2018). Herviella evelinae (Er. Marcus, 1965). Accessed on 2018-02-18. ==Distribution== This species was described from the Caroline Islands. ==References== Category:Facelinidae Category:Gastropods described in 1965
title: Herviella evelinae
